dataTemplate.name: BCO_SHIPMENTS_COMPLETE_DOC_MAN
dataTemplate.description: BCO Shipments Complete by Doc Manager

dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT b.doc_manager, SUM(b.tot_2083) ct_2083, SUM(b.tot_2084) ct_2084, SUM(b.tot_2184) ct_2184, SUM(b.tot_2185) ct_2185, SUM(b.tot_2200) ct_2200, SUM(b.tot_3311) ct_3311, SUM(b.tot_5071) ct_5071, SUM(b.tot_5078) ct_5078, SUM(b.tot_5334) ct_5334, SUM(b.tot_5335) ct_5335, SUM(b.tot_5531) ct_5531, SUM(b.tot_8560) ct_8560, SUM(b.tot_8860) ct_8860, SUM(b.tot_ship) shipments_completed, SUM(b.cont_total) containers, ROUND(SUM(b.days_to_payment) / SUM(b.tot_ship),1) average_days, SUM(b.pmt_recd_total) payment_received FROM (SELECT a.doc_manager, (CASE WHEN a.loc_code = '2083' THEN TO_CHAR(COUNT(a.shipment_gid)) ELSE '' END) tot_2083, (CASE WHEN a.loc_code = '2084' THEN TO_CHAR(COUNT(a.shipment_gid)) ELSE '' END) tot_2084, (CASE WHEN a.loc_code = '2184' THEN TO_CHAR(COUNT(a.shipment_gid)) ELSE '' END) tot_2184, (CASE WHEN a.loc_code = '2185' THEN TO_CHAR(COUNT(a.shipment_gid)) ELSE '' END) tot_2185, (CASE WHEN a.loc_code = '2200' THEN TO_CHAR(COUNT(a.shipment_gid)) ELSE '' END) tot_2200, (CASE WHEN a.loc_code = '3311' THEN TO_CHAR(COUNT(a.shipment_gid)) ELSE '' END) tot_3311, (CASE WHEN a.loc_code = '5071' THEN TO_CHAR(COUNT(a.shipment_gid)) ELSE '' END) tot_5071, (CASE WHEN a.loc_code = '5078' THEN TO_CHAR(COUNT(a.shipment_gid)) ELSE '' END) tot_5078, (CASE WHEN a.loc_code = '5334' THEN TO_CHAR(COUNT(a.shipment_gid)) ELSE '' END) tot_5334, (CASE WHEN a.loc_code = '5335' THEN TO_CHAR(COUNT(a.shipment_gid)) ELSE '' END) tot_5335, (CASE WHEN a.loc_code = '5531' THEN TO_CHAR(COUNT(a.shipment_gid)) ELSE '' END) tot_5531, (CASE WHEN a.loc_code = '8560' THEN TO_CHAR(COUNT(a.shipment_gid)) ELSE '' END) tot_8560, (CASE WHEN a.loc_code = '8860' THEN TO_CHAR(COUNT(a.shipment_gid)) ELSE '' END) tot_8860, COUNT(a.shipment_gid) tot_ship, SUM(a.container_count) cont_total, SUM(a.days_to_payment) days_to_payment, SUM(a.pmt_recd_count) pmt_recd_total FROM ( SELECT con.contact_gid, con.first_name || ' ' || con.last_name doc_manager, sref.shipment_refnum_value loc_code, s.shipment_gid, (SELECT COUNT(ssu.s_ship_unit_gid) FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1) container_count, (TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(from_tz(CAST(s.attribute_date4 AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central', 'MM/DD/YY'),'MM/DD/YY') - TO_DATE(s.sail_date,'dd-mm-rr')) days_to_payment, (CASE WHEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(from_tz(CAST(s.attribute_date4 AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central', 'MM/DD/YY'),'MM/DD/YY') <= TO_DATE((CASE WHEN s.dest_location_gid IS NULL THEN s.port_discharge_eta ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(s.port_discharge_eta,s.dest_location_gid) END),'dd-mm-rr') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) pmt_recd_count FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sref ON s.shipment_gid = sref.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' INNER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip ON s.shipment_gid = sip.shipment_gid AND sip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.DOCUMENT MANAGER' INNER JOIN contact con ON sip.involved_party_contact_gid = con.contact_gid WHERE s.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND sref.shipment_refnum_value IN ('2083','2084','2184','2185','2200','3311','5071','5078','5334','5335','5531','8560','8860') AND NOT s.attribute_date4 IS NULL AND (TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(from_tz(CAST(s.attribute_date4 AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central', 'MM/DD/YY'),'MM/DD/YY') >= TO_DATE(:START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(from_tz(CAST(s.attribute_date4 AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central', 'MM/DD/YY'),'MM/DD/YY') <= TO_DATE(:END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'))) a GROUP BY a.doc_manager, a.loc_code) b GROUP BY b.doc_manager ORDER BY b.doc_manager

SELECT SUM(b.ct_2083) tot_2083, SUM(b.ct_2084) tot_2084, SUM(b.ct_2184) tot_2184, SUM(b.ct_2185) tot_2185, SUM(b.ct_2200) tot_2200, SUM(b.ct_3311) tot_3311, SUM(b.ct_5071) tot_5071, SUM(b.ct_5078) tot_5078, SUM(b.ct_5334) tot_5334, SUM(b.ct_5335) tot_5335, SUM(b.ct_5531) tot_5531, SUM(b.ct_8560) tot_8560, SUM(b.ct_8860) tot_8860, SUM(b.tot_ship) shipments_completed_total, SUM(b.cont_total) containers_total, ROUND(SUM(b.days_to_payment) / SUM(b.tot_ship),1) average_days_total, SUM(b.pmt_recd_total) payment_received_total FROM (SELECT (CASE WHEN a.loc_code = '2083' THEN TO_CHAR(COUNT(a.shipment_gid)) ELSE '' END) ct_2083, (CASE WHEN a.loc_code = '2084' THEN TO_CHAR(COUNT(a.shipment_gid)) ELSE '' END) ct_2084, (CASE WHEN a.loc_code = '2184' THEN TO_CHAR(COUNT(a.shipment_gid)) ELSE '' END) ct_2184, (CASE WHEN a.loc_code = '2185' THEN TO_CHAR(COUNT(a.shipment_gid)) ELSE '' END) ct_2185, (CASE WHEN a.loc_code = '2200' THEN TO_CHAR(COUNT(a.shipment_gid)) ELSE '' END) ct_2200, (CASE WHEN a.loc_code = '3311' THEN TO_CHAR(COUNT(a.shipment_gid)) ELSE '' END) ct_3311, (CASE WHEN a.loc_code = '5071' THEN TO_CHAR(COUNT(a.shipment_gid)) ELSE '' END) ct_5071, (CASE WHEN a.loc_code = '5078' THEN TO_CHAR(COUNT(a.shipment_gid)) ELSE '' END) ct_5078, (CASE WHEN a.loc_code = '5334' THEN TO_CHAR(COUNT(a.shipment_gid)) ELSE '' END) ct_5334, (CASE WHEN a.loc_code = '5335' THEN TO_CHAR(COUNT(a.shipment_gid)) ELSE '' END) ct_5335, (CASE WHEN a.loc_code = '5531' THEN TO_CHAR(COUNT(a.shipment_gid)) ELSE '' END) ct_5531, (CASE WHEN a.loc_code = '8560' THEN TO_CHAR(COUNT(a.shipment_gid)) ELSE '' END) ct_8560, (CASE WHEN a.loc_code = '8860' THEN TO_CHAR(COUNT(a.shipment_gid)) ELSE '' END) ct_8860, COUNT(a.shipment_gid) tot_ship, SUM(a.container_count) cont_total, SUM(a.days_to_payment) days_to_payment, SUM(a.pmt_recd_count) pmt_recd_total FROM ( SELECT sref.shipment_refnum_value loc_code, s.shipment_gid, (SELECT COUNT(ssu.s_ship_unit_gid) FROM shipment_stop_d sstopd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid AND NOT ssu.tag_3 IS NULL WHERE sstopd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1) container_count, (TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(from_tz(CAST(s.attribute_date4 AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central', 'MM/DD/YY'),'MM/DD/YY') - TO_DATE((CASE WHEN s.source_location_gid IS NULL THEN s.sail_date ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(s.sail_date,s.source_location_gid) END),'dd-mm-rr')) days_to_payment, (CASE WHEN TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(from_tz(CAST(s.attribute_date4 AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central', 'MM/DD/YY'),'MM/DD/YY') <= TO_DATE((CASE WHEN s.dest_location_gid IS NULL THEN s.port_discharge_eta ELSE glogowner.utc.get_local_date(s.port_discharge_eta,s.dest_location_gid) END),'dd-mm-rr') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) pmt_recd_count FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sref ON s.shipment_gid = sref.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' INNER JOIN shipment_involved_party sip ON s.shipment_gid = sip.shipment_gid AND sip.involved_party_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.DOCUMENT MANAGER' INNER JOIN contact con ON sip.involved_party_contact_gid = con.contact_gid WHERE s.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND NOT s.attribute_date4 IS NULL AND sref.shipment_refnum_value IN ('2083','2084','2184','2185','2200','3311','5071','5078','5334','5335','5531','8560','8860') AND (TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(from_tz(CAST(s.attribute_date4 AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central', 'MM/DD/YY'),'MM/DD/YY') >= TO_DATE(:START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(from_tz(CAST(s.attribute_date4 AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central', 'MM/DD/YY'),'MM/DD/YY') <= TO_DATE(:END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'))) a GROUP BY a.loc_code) b
